Rulings.Tengu:
Used
 means that that card can't:

● Be Activated from hand.

● Be Set from hand.

● Be Summoned from hand nor Extra Deck.

● Activate/apply its effects (unless lingering and already applied, such as an already resolved "Maxx "C"").

● Be used as Material for a Fusion/Synchro Summon.

● Change its Battle Position.

● Declare an Attack.

This applies to cards in all zones, including currently face-up on the field or the graveyard, including the continuous effect of "Vanity's Fiend", "Royal Decree" or "Phantom Beast Cross-Wing".
